django-vue-utilities

InstallÂ¶

Install with the pip package manager.

$ mkvirtualenv myvenv -p python3
$ pip install django
$ pip install django-vue-utils

After creating a project, add django_vue_utilities to INSTALLED_APPS in settings.py.

INSTALLED_APPS = [
    # ...
    'django_vue_utilities',
]

Remember to update your requirements.txt file. In your project directory:

$ pip freeze > requirements.txt
